course_title: Literary and Visual Culture in Japan
course_description: An exploration of the complex interactions between written texts and the visual arts in Japan from the classical era to the present. Discussion will include prose, poetry, printing, picture scrolls, calligraphy, woodblock prints, and film.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2490, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: C. Crowley, Status: Closed
